channel.title: [PI/DSPK]Beast of Burden - item gaps on interface ?.? [rep++]
channel.description:
okay so im working on beast of burden and ive got the items to appear on the interface and everything but theyre out of line, so i was wondering if anyone knew how to change the gaps between the items on the interface? :S
here is an image of what i mean: [img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/7286/unledkli.png[/img]
all help appreciated
thanks chris
